## üß† [Context Awareness]{style="color:#6a1b9a;"}

::::: columns
::: {.column width="60%"}
**Positron** accesses project metadata.
Thus **AI 'knows':**

-   üìÅ **Files str.**: Code, docs
-   üìä **Data**: Var. names, types
-   ‚èÆÔ∏è **History**: Edits, commands
-   üì¶ **Environment**: Packages
-   üéØ **Intent**: Current task
-   ‚úÖ **Results**: Output, errors
:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
[**Why does it matter?**]{style="color:#6a1b9a;"}

-   üéØ Project-specific suggestions
-   üîó Understands dependencies

-   ‚è±Ô∏è Improves efficiency

## ‚úçÔ∏è [Efficient Prompting]{style="color:#2e7d32;"}

:::: incremental
::: {style="font-size: 0.60em;"}
-   [üéØ **Be specific**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}:

    "Write a Stata do-file to ‚Ä¶" / "Refactor this R function to ‚Ä¶"

-   [üß© **Provide context**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}:

    "Goal: X; Dataset: Y variables; Constraints: Z (WB rules, packages, runtime)"

-   [üìå **Define expected output**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}:

    "Save as regression_results.xlsx, format as APA table" / "Create bar chart with 95% CIs"

-   [üîÅ **Summarize + clarify first**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}:

    "Restate and ask clarifying questions before implementing", "Explain why ...", "Give alternatives with trade-offs..."

-   [ü™ú **Iterate in small steps**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}:

    "minimal changes", "refine"

-   [üõë **Set boundaries**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}:

    "Don‚Äôt use ... data", "Don‚Äôt print secrets, ask if in doubt.", "Don‚Äôt change files".
:::
::::

::: footer
**Tip:** Treat the assistant as a *collaborator*.
:::

## ‚ö†Ô∏è [Limitations]{style="color:#b00020;"} and [Remedies]{style="color:#1b5e20;"} {.smaller}

::: incremental
-   [‚ö†Ô∏é **Wrong-but-plausible outputs / hallucinations**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: code runs but logic is wrong

    [‚úì **Verify and validate**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: ask the model to **explain and justify** the solution

-   [‚ö†Ô∏é **Context limits**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: not all files/data are in context; too large projects.

    [‚úì **Be explicit**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: state assumptions, expected inputs/outputs, and references

-   [‚ö†Ô∏é **Outdated knowledge**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: suggested APIs/packages/options may have changed

    [‚úì **Teach the model**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: provide references/links; ask it to learn

-   [‚ö†Ô∏é **Over-reliance**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: erodes fundamentals; mistakes slip through unchallenged

    [‚úì **Keep learning**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: ask for step-by-step reasoning; request alternatives and trade-offs

-   [‚ö†Ô∏é **Confidentiality / security / privacy**]{style="color:#b00020;"}

    [‚úì **Constrain context**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: exclude sensitive data; use `.copilot-ignore`; [AI \@ WB](https://ai.worldbank.org/responsible-use)

-   [‚ö†Ô∏é **Reproducibility**]{style="color:#b00020;"}: answers can vary across sessions/models/settings

    [‚úì **Cutomize agents**]{style="color:#1b5e20;"}: save prompts, use Git; create AI agents
:::

::: footer
**Read more:** [GitHub Copilot Trust Center](https://resources.github.com/copilot-trust-center/){target="_blank"} \| [AI \@ WB: ai.worldbank.org](https://ai.worldbank.org/){target="_blank"}
:::

## Software Setup Overview {.smaller}

::: callout-note
**Full details:** [Setup Instructions](setup-instructions.qmd#setup)
:::

1.  **Install prerequisite software** (via WB Software Center)
    -   Stata 19+, R 4.5+, Python 3.13+, Quarto, Git
    -   Install Python `uv` package: `pip install uv`
2.  **Install Positron IDE** (system-level install): Request help from IT if needed
3.  **Install key extensions** in Positron
    -   **Stata MCP**, **Quarto**
4.  **Connect GitHub** and configure [Positron Assistant](https://positron.posit.co/assistant.html)
5.  **Start experimenting!**
    -   Open assistant: `Ctrl+Shift+P` \> "Ask Positron Assistant"
    -   Try: chat, agent mode, inline code completion

## Positron + Stata

::: {width="100%"}
1.  Make sure [prerequisite software is installed](./setup-instructions.qmd#prereq-software) (Stata, R, Positron)

2.  [Install Python](./setup-instructions.qmd#python-uv) after that the `uv` package: `pip install uv`

3.  [Install Stata MCP](./setup-instructions.qmd#stata-mcp-extension) in Positron and configure Stata path and Edition

4.  Create a new Stata do-file, write some code, save it and press run it.
:::
